title: Social Networking-Based Mobile Design & Tech Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Basic Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning of mathematical principles in design and tech fields within mobile environments, with content structured considering limited technical environments (smartphone-only)

learning_goals: Learners can accurately apply foundational statistical and geometric concepts used in the design process with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve design problems by exchanging feedback three or more times with peers via a mobile collaboration platform.
Learners can produce two or more simple design prototypes using mathematical modeling techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
